actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1937 to provide a full annuity for any individual (without regard to his age) who has completed 30 years of railroad service.

summary.text: Provides, under the Railroad Retirement Act of 1937, a full annuity for any individual (without regard to his age) who has completed thirty years of railroad service. (Amends 45 U.S.C. 228a)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1937 to provide a full annuity for any individual (without regard to his age) who has completed 30 years of railroad service.
